text: @realDonaldTrump #CoronaKing Trump scoped out his next victim, where he is able to increase infections...#Arizona , another petri dish already, is the destination tomorrow. Noticed that all the red states are the ones(with the exception of California) are the hotbeds of #Covid19. No masks there.
